exceptions.exn: In environment a, b : nat Hb : b <> 0 Unable to unify "{q : nat | a = b * q}" with "{q : nat & {r : nat | a = b * q + r /\\ r < b}}".
In environment H : forall a b : nat, divides a b -> {q : nat | a = b * q} a, b : nat Hb : b = 0 -> False The term "Hb" has type "b = 0 -> False" while it is expected to have type "divides a b".

original: intros a b Hb. apply (quo_dec a b). - unfold divides. exists (quo a b Hb). reflexivity. - apply Nat.mod_upper_bound, Hb.
